mapper.select:
/****** [ quality.claimStatusSelect ] ******/
BEGIN DECLARE @P_FROM_DT NVARCHAR(8) = LEFT (@{fromMon}, 4) + '0101'; DECLARE @P_CUR_YEAR NVARCHAR(4) = LEFT (CONVERT (NVARCHAR (30), DBO.UFN_GETDATE(), 112), 4);
IF LEFT (@{fromMon}, 4) = @P_CUR_YEAR SET @P_FROM_DT = @{fromMon} + '01';
WITH W_ITEM AS (
), W_CLM AS ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ITEM_CD , RECEIVE_DATE YYYYMMDD , QTY , 'CLAIM' FLAG FROM TB_DYN_CLAIM CLM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CLM.COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND CLM.BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND CLM.RECEIVE_DATE BETWEEN @P_FROM_DT AND @{toMon} + '31' UNION ALL SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ITEM_CD , GI_DATE , QTY , 'GI' FLAG FROM TB_DYN_GI GI WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE GI.COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND GI.BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND GI.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND GI.PLANT_CD = 'WF01' AND GI.GI_DATE BETWEEN @P_FROM_DT AND @{toMon} + '31' ) SELECT NULL AS TMP_COL
#foreach( $bucketMap in $_parameter.bucketList ) #set( $month = "$bucketMap.BUCKET_VAL" ) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("MT") > -1) #if(($month == $_parameter.startYear) and ($month == $_parameter.endYear)) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ROUND (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000, 0) AS $bucketMap.CD #end #elseif($month == $_parameter.startYear) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ROUND (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000, 0) AS $bucketMap.CD #end #elseif($month == $_parameter.endYear) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ROUND (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000, 0) AS $bucketMap.CD #end #else #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ROUND (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000, 0) AS $bucketMap.CD #end #end
#else #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS $bucketMap.CD #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ROUND (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000, 0) AS $bucketMap.CD #end #end #end #if ($_parameter.bucketList.size() > 0) #foreach( $bucketMap in $_parameter.bucketList ) #set( $month = "$bucketMap.BUCKET_VAL" ) #if($foreach.count > 1)
#if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("MT") > -1) #if(($month == $_parameter.startYear) and ($month == $_parameter.endYear)) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#elseif($month == $_parameter.startYear) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#elseif($month == $_parameter.endYear) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#else #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#end
#else #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) + ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end #end
#else #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("MT") > -1) #if(($month == $_parameter.startYear) and ($month == $_parameter.endYear)) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#elseif($month == $_parameter.startYear) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN @{fromMon} + '01' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#elseif($month == $_parameter.endYear) #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND @{toMon} + '31' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#else #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD BETWEEN '$month' + '0101' AND '$month' + '1231' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end
#end
#else #if($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_CLAIM") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_GI") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END)), 0) #elseif($bucketMap.CD.indexOf("_RATE") > -1) , ISNULL(ABS(CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN CLM_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)) / NULLIF (CAST (SUM (CASE WHEN YYYYMMDD LIKE '$month' + '%' THEN GI_QTY ELSE NULL END) AS NUMERIC(20, 10)), 0) * 1000000), 0) #end #end #end #end AS OMIT_FLAG #else , 0 AS OMIT_FLAG #end FROM ( SELECT IT.COMPANY_CD , IT.BU_CD , ISNULL (IT.REP_ITEM_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS REP_ITEM_GROUP_CD , ISNULL (IT.REP_ITEM_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS REP_ITEM_GROUP_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.REP_ITEM_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS REP_ITEM_GROUP_NM , ISNULL (IT.REP_ITEM_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS REP_ITEM_GROUP_NM_NM , ISNULL (IT.ROUTING_ID, ' ') AS ROUTING_ID , ISNULL (IT.ROUTING_ID, ' ') AS ROUTING_ID_NM , ISNULL (IT.REP_CUST_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS REP_CUST_GROUP_CD , ISNULL (IT.REP_CUST_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS REP_CUST_GROUP_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.REP_CUST_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS REP_CUST_GROUP_NM , ISNULL (IT.REP_CUST_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS REP_CUST_GROUP_NM_NM , ISNULL (IT.CUST_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS CUST_GROUP_CD , ISNULL (IT.CUST_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS CUST_GROUP_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.CUST_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS CUST_GROUP_NM , ISNULL (IT.CUST_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS CUST_GROUP_NM_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_CD , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_GROUP_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_GROUP_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP_NM_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_CD , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_NM_NM , ISNULL (IT.SPEC, ' ') AS SPEC , ISNULL (IT.SPEC, ' ') AS SPEC_NM , ISNULL (IT.DRAW_NO, ' ') AS DRAW_NO , ISNULL (IT.DRAW_NO, ' ') AS DRAW_NO_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_TYPE, ' ') AS ITEM_TYPE_CD , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_TYPE, ' ') AS ITEM_TYPE_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_TYPE_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , ISNULL (IT.ITEM_TYPE_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_TYPE_NM_NM , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL4_CD, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL4_CD , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL4_CD, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL4_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL4_NM, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL4_NM , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL4_NM, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL4_NM_NM , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL5_CD, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL5_CD , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL5_CD, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL5_CD_NM , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL5_NM, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL5_NM , ISNULL (IT.SALES_ORG_LVL5_NM, ' ') AS SALES_ORG_LVL5_NM_NM , IT.KEY_GROUP_YN , CLM.YYYYMMDD , CASE CLM.FLAG WHEN 'CLAIM' THEN CLM.QTY ELSE NULL END CLM_QTY , CASE CLM.FLAG WHEN 'GI' THEN CLM.QTY ELSE NULL END GI_QTY FROM W_ITEM IT INNER JOIN W_CLM CLM ON IT.COMPANY_CD = CLM.COMPANY_CD AND IT.BU_CD = CLM.BU_CD AND IT.ITEM_CD = CLM.ITEM_CD WHERE IT.COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND IT.BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND IT.ITEM_TYPE IN ('10', '50') -------------------------------------------------------- -- 20210602 김수호 추가 AND IT.REP_CUST_GROUP_CD IS NOT NULL
-------------------------------------------------------- #if($_parameter.item_cd and $_parameter.item_cd != "") AND IT.ITEM_CD IN ('$_parameter.item_cd.replace(",","','")') #elseif($_parameter.item_nm and $_parameter.item_nm != "") AND (IT.ITEM_CD LIKE '%'+@{item_nm}+'%' OR CT.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'+@{item_nm}+'%') #end #if($_parameter.itemGroup and $_parameter.itemGroup != "") AND IT.ITEM_GROUP_CD IN ('$_parameter.itemGroup.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.route and $_parameter.route != "") AND IT.ROUTING_ID IN ('$_parameter.route.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.reptItemGroup and $_parameter.reptItemGroup != "") AND IT.REP_ITEM_GROUP_CD IN ('$_parameter.reptItemGroup.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.keyGroupYn and $_parameter.keyGroupYn != "") AND IT.KEY_GROUP_YN = @{keyGroupYn} #end ) A GROUP BY ROLLUP ( ) ORDER BY TMP_COL #foreach( $dimMap in $_parameter.dimList ) , A.$dimMap.DIM_CD #end END;
